description: Complete Gatecheck evaluation for Story Spark TU (topology update). Shows full flow: gate submission, evaluation of all 8 quality bars, conditional pass decision (Style yellow), smallest viable fix identification, and merge coordination. Demonstrates bar-by-bar review and remediation handoffs.

messages.description: Plotwright submits Story Spark TU for gatecheck

messages.description: Gatekeeper evaluates all 8 bars and issues conditional pass decision

data.title: TU-2025-11-05-PW01 Gatecheck
data.scope: Story Spark: Wormhole 3 hub and toll gateway mechanic
artifacts_samples: Gateway: toll mechanic (transit permit / favor trade)
data.why: 7 bars green; Style bar yellow (Section 17 choice text tone inconsistent with hub cynicism motif)
data.next_actions: Merge approved with handoff to Style Lead: revise Section 17 choice text to match hub tone; due before next export

bars.evidence: All references resolve; timeline consistent; no orphaned sections
Wormhole 3 hub reachable from Act 2 Section 12; all 4 branches lead to valid terminals or loops
Hub offers 4 distinct paths; toll gateway creates state-gated access (permit OR favor); loop back with difference (toll paid state visible)
Toll gateway uses diegetic conditions: 'transit permit' (item) or 'favor trade' (reputation); PN can enforce without leaking internals
Section 17 choice text uses formal register ('Please select your preferred route') inconsistent with hub's cynical tone ('Slip through' / 'Pay the toll')
bars.smallest_viable_fix: Revise Section 17 choice text to match hub cynicism: replace 'Please select your preferred route' with 'Which way through?'

bars.evidence: No generative assets; all prose human-authored; N/A for this TU
No spoilers in section briefs; gateway conditions player-safe; hooks tagged for Hot-only details
Choice labels descriptive; no navigation ambiguity; reading level consistent

handoffs: Bar: Style; Fix: Revise Section 17 choice text to match hub tone; Owner: SS; TU: TU-2025-11-05-SS03; Due: before next export
Lore Deepening: Canonize toll mechanic (who collects? why?); Owner: LW; TU: TU-2025-11-06-LW02; Due: before Act 3 draft
Codex Expansion: Add entry for Wormhole 3 and transit permits; Owner: CC; TU: TU-2025-11-06-CC03; Due: before next export
checklist: Decision ties to bar statuses: conditional pass (Style yellow, no reds)
Smallest viable fix specified: revise Section 17 choice text
Safety verified: no spoilers; gateway conditions diegetic
Dormancy acknowledged: Research dormant (no factual hooks in this TU)
Handoffs documented: Style fix + Lore + Codex follow-ups with owners and due dates
